title: Implement chord progression inference
description: Sliding window chord detection (beat/half-bar). Match candidate triads/7ths. Temporal smoothing. Map to Roman numerals relative to detected key

title: Add batch processing for large corpus
description: Process MIDI files in parallel with configurable worker count. Progress reporting. Resume from interruption. Skip already-processed files

title: Set up CLI framework with Click
description: Create main CLI entry point with subcommands: analyze, search, export, stats. Include --verbose, --config options

title: Implement filename metadata extractor
description: Parse artist/title from: folder structure (Letter/Artist/Title.mid), hyphenated filenames, nonstop2k format. Extract MIDI meta events for track names

title: Pattern Library & Storage
description: SQLite database for songs, tracks, patterns, and instances with query interface

title: Implement API response caching
description: Cache MusicBrainz/Discogs responses in SQLite. TTL-based expiry. Exponential backoff on rate limits

title: Track Analysis Pipeline
description: Stages 1-2: Per-track feature extraction and role inference (drums, bass, chords, lead, arp, pad)

title: Implement Discogs integration
description: Use Discogs API for genre/style lookup. Handle API key configuration. Rate limit 60 req/min. Fallback when MusicBrainz fails

title: Implement genre tag normalization
description: Map vendor-specific tags to canonical genre taxonomy. Store raw and normalized tags. Score confidence based on source agreement

title: Implement track role classifier
description: Score tracks against role heuristics: drums (ch10, density), bass (low register, monophonic), chords/pad (polyphonic, long), lead (monophonic, wide range), arp (high rate, broken chords). Output probability distribution

title: Implement rhythm fingerprinting
description: Generate binary/weighted onset grids (16/32 steps per bar). Create hashable fingerprint for fast comparison. Include accent profile

title: Implement database repository layer
description: Create SongRepository, PatternRepository classes with CRUD operations. Support bulk inserts for performance. Use context managers for transactions

title: Implement quantization engine
description: Quantize notes to configurable grid (1/8, 1/16, 1/32). Preserve original timing alongside quantized. Support swing detection

title: Implement MIDI file parser
description: Use mido to parse MIDI files. Extract all tracks, note on/off events, tempo changes, time signature changes. Handle both Type 0 and Type 1 MIDI files

title: Harmony & Song-Level Analysis
description: Stages 5-7: Key detection, chord progression inference, arpeggio analysis, section segmentation

title: Initialize Python package structure
description: Create src/midi_analyzer package with __init__.py, pyproject.toml, README, .gitignore. Include dev dependencies: pytest, pytest-cov, ruff, mypy

title: Pattern Extraction & Mining
description: Stages 3-4: Bar chunking, fingerprinting, pattern mining, and deduplication

title: Build tempo/time-sig map resolver
description: Convert tick-based timing to beat-based timing. Handle tempo changes mid-song. Compute bar/beat indices for each note

title: MIDI Ingest & Normalization
description: Stage 0: Parse MIDI files, extract tempo/time-sig maps, normalize note events to beat-based timing, extract metadata from filenames/folders

title: Implement MusicBrainz integration
description: Use musicbrainzngs to search recordings by artist+title. Extract genre tags, release info. Implement rate limiting (1 req/sec)

title: Metadata & Genre Retrieval
description: Web API integration for genre/tag retrieval via MusicBrainz, Discogs, Last.fm with caching and rate limiting

title: Implement pitch fingerprinting
description: Generate relative interval sequences normalized for transposition. Create hashable fingerprint. Include pitch contour descriptor

title: Create core data models
description: Define dataclasses/Pydantic models: NoteEvent, TempoEvent, TimeSignature, Track, Song, Pattern, PatternInstance

title: Implement pattern search/query interface
description: Query patterns by: role, length, meter, fingerprint similarity, genre/tags. Support fuzzy matching and combined filters

title: Design SQLite schema
description: Create tables: songs, tracks, patterns, pattern_instances, metadata_cache. Add indexes for fingerprint lookups. Include migration system

title: Implement key detection
description: Build pitch-class histograms weighted by note duration. Match against major/minor key profiles. Report key + mode with confidence

title: Implement bar chunking
description: Segment tracks into 1-bar, 2-bar, and 4-bar chunks aligned to bar boundaries. Handle partial bars at song end

title: Implement pattern deduplication
description: Detect repeated chunks within a track. Cluster similar chunks using fingerprint similarity. Select canonical representatives with confidence scores

title: Implement track feature extractor
description: Compute per-track features: note density, polyphony ratio, pitch range/median, rhythmic complexity (syncopation), repetition score, drum-likeness indicators
